title: Sanctuary
description: Sheridan Roberts has run his animal sanctuary on the remote Scottish island of Aurora for two years and been alone since his partner Scott ran off with most of his lottery winnings. He doesn't trust anyone, only his animals, and has been trying unsuccessfully not to notice his employee Elliot Fox.Elliot is head over heels in love with his cold boss and just as passionate as him about animals. He believes he doesn't stand a chance but he's prepared to fight off other men to win a chance at Sheridan's bruised heart.
author: Scarlet Blackwell
